streamlit及heroku的初步配置
posts.text:
streamlit安装1$ pip install streamlit 项目构建目录12345678|- images # 文件夹存放图片，自定义|- style # 文件夹，存放css等，自定义|- pages # 文件夹，存放其他页面python文件|- app.py|- setup.sh|- Procfile|- runtime.txt|- requirements.txt app.py1234567891011import streamlit as stfrom openpyxl import load_workbook,workbookst.write('hello world!')upload_file = st.file_uploader("请上传csv")if upload_file: print(upload_file) read_csv = load_workbook(upload_file) st.write(read_csv['test'].cell(1,1).value) setup.sh12345678910111213mkdir -p ~/.streamlit/echo "\[general]
\email = \"heroku注册邮箱\"
\" > ~/.streamlit/credentials.tomlecho "\[server]
\headless = true
\enableCORS=false
\port = $PORT
\" > ~/.streamlit/config.toml Procfile1web: sh setup.sh && streamlit run app.py runtime.txt1python-3.7.13 requirements.txt12streamlitopenpyxl 配置herokuhttps://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/getting-started-with-python#deploy-the-app 注册需要梯子，否则无法显示验证码 下载heroku cli登录12$ heroku login -i直接在命令行登录 创建app1$ heroku create 重命名123456# 修改名称 (xxx是你的app的新名称,yyy是app的旧名称）$ heroku apps:rename xxx --app yyy# 将名称修改推送到远端$ git remote rm heroku$ heroku git:remote -a xxx 推送12345$ cd project$ git init$ git add .$ git commit -m "init"$ git push heroku master 打开1$ heroku open
